data.title: Fuel
data.content: F.U.E.L is a TRUCK Contemporary Art initiative that redistributes new and gently-used art materials to our communities through the F.U.E.L Supply Store, fostering sustainable artistic practice and encouraging resource sharing.

data.title: Supply Victoria
data.content: SUPPLY is a non-profit that redistributes used art, office, & school supplies and offers creative reuse education to youth and adults.

data.title: Urban Source
data.content: Urban Source offers unique and diverse discarded materials for artistic endeavors, which are stored in large barrels for bulk sale. They also carry a variety of traditional art and craft supplies.

data.title: Jerry's Artarama
data.content: Jery's Artarama is a great place to find art supplies at a discount. They have a wide variety of art supplies and are always adding new items to their sale section.

data.title: Artist & Craftsman Supply
data.content: Artist & Craftsman Supply is a top destination for artists, designers, and students seeking high-quality art supplies. They offer affordable prices, exceptional service, and an extensive inventory of paints, brushes, canvas, paper, and more.

data.title: Jackson's Art Supplies
data.content: Jackson's Art is known for their fast and reliable shipping, competitive prices, and commitment to sustainability through their eco-friendly product offerings and packaging.

data.title: Blick
data.content: Blick has a vast selection of art supplies for all artists, including paints, brushes, canvas, paper, drafting tools, and more, from popular and lesser-known brands. They offer a wide range of art education resources, such as online and in-store workshops, classes, and tutorials.

data.title: Cheap Joe's Art Stuff
data.content: Cheap Joe's Art Stuff is committed to supporting artists and providing them with the tools they need to create and express themselves.  With a focus on affordability and accessibility, Cheap Joe's offers a wide range of art supplies for artists of all levels, from beginners to professionals.
